document.forum_title: Latest Big News Network RSS Feeds
document.discussion_title: Green expects struggling 'pen to turn it around
document.topic_text: San Diego Padres Monday 25th April, 2016 Brandon Maurer (0-1) came on in the eighth inning on Sunday and gave up three runs. "It wasn't our best effort out there tonight," Padres manager Andy Green said of the bullpen's performance. "We've got plenty of bullpen pieces. If you look back, historically, at who Kevin Quackenbush and Brandon Maurer are, they're very good. It was just a tough couple-game stretch for us." ...
